citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"fb1009b1-2254-450c-aaf3-99420f7dc10c\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Marine Institute - CTec - SmartAtlantic\"}, {\"literal\": \"COVE\"}, {\"given\": \"Centre for Ocean Ventures & Entrepreneurship\", \"family\": \"(COVE)\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"11\", \"19\"]}], \"abstract\": \"D\u00e9ploy\u00e9e en novembre 2015, la station m\u00e9t\u00e9orologique est situ\u00e9e au terminal \u00e0 conteneurs Fairview Cove, dans le bassin de Bedford. La station est compos\u00e9e d'un an\u00e9mom\u00e8tre RM Young mod\u00e8le 85004, mont\u00e9 sur un tr\u00e9pied de 20 m au sommet de l'\u00e9difice administratif Ceres, sur le terminal. Les donn\u00e9es de la station sont disponibles en temps quasi r\u00e9el et sont utilis\u00e9es par les navigateurs de cette r\u00e9gion pour appuyer des op\u00e9rations maritimes plus s\u00e9curitaires et plus efficaces.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Halifax Ocean Terminals\u00a0: Fairview\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioosatlantic.ca/dataset/fb1009b1-2254-450c-aaf3-99420f7dc10c?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"fb1009b1-2254-450c-aaf3-99420f7dc10c\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Marine Institute - CTec - SmartAtlantic\"}, {\"literal\": \"COVE\"}, {\"given\": \"Centre for Ocean Ventures & Entrepreneurship\", \"family\": \"(COVE)\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"11\", \"19\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Deployed in November 2015, the Meteorological Station is located at the Fairview Cove Container Terminal on Bedford Basin. The station consists of an RM Young Model 85004 anemometer, mounted on a 20m tripod atop the Ceres Administration Building on the terminal. Data from the station is available in near-real time and is utilized by mariners in this region in support of safer and more efficient marine operations.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Halifax Ocean Terminals: Fairview\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioosatlantic.ca/dataset/fb1009b1-2254-450c-aaf3-99420f7dc10c?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>Deployed in November 2015, the Meteorological Station is located at the Fairview Cove Container Terminal on Bedford Basin. The station consists of an RM Young Model 85004 anemometer, mounted on a 20m tripod atop the Ceres Administration Building on the terminal. Data from the station is available in near-real time and is utilized by mariners in this region in support of safer and more efficient marine operations.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">D\u00e9ploy\u00e9e en novembre 2015, la station m\u00e9t\u00e9orologique est situ\u00e9e au terminal \u00e0 conteneurs Fairview Cove, dans le bassin de Bedford. La station est compos\u00e9e d'un an\u00e9mom\u00e8tre RM Young mod\u00e8le 85004, mont\u00e9 sur un tr\u00e9pied de 20 m au sommet de l'\u00e9difice administratif Ceres, sur le terminal. Les donn\u00e9es de la station sont disponibles en temps quasi r\u00e9el et sont utilis\u00e9es par les navigateurs de cette r\u00e9gion pour appuyer des op\u00e9rations maritimes plus s\u00e9curitaires et plus efficaces.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelists/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="onGoing">
        </mcc:MD_ProgressCode>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

name: fb1009b1-2254-450c-aaf3-99420f7dc10c
notes: Deployed in November 2015, the Meteorological Station is located at the Fairview Cove Container Terminal on Bedford Basin. The station consists of an RM Young Model 85004 anemometer, mounted on a 20m tripod atop the Ceres Administration Building on the terminal. Data from the station is available in near-real time and is utilized by mariners in this region in support of safer and more efficient marine operations.

notes_translated.en: Deployed in November 2015, the Meteorological Station is located at the Fairview Cove Container Terminal on Bedford Basin. The station consists of an RM Young Model 85004 anemometer, mounted on a 20m tripod atop the Ceres Administration Building on the terminal. Data from the station is available in near-real time and is utilized by mariners in this region in support of safer and more efficient marine operations.
notes_translated.fr: Déployée en novembre 2015, la station météorologique est située au terminal à conteneurs Fairview Cove, dans le bassin de Bedford. La station est composée d'un anémomètre RM Young modèle 85004, monté sur un trépied de 20 m au sommet de l'édifice administratif Ceres, sur le terminal. Les données de la station sont disponibles en temps quasi réel et sont utilisées par les navigateurs de cette région pour appuyer des opérations maritimes plus sécuritaires et plus efficaces.

description_translated.fr:
CIOOS-Atlantic est un consortium d’institutions partenaires engagées dans le développement de la gestion et la diffusion des données océanographiques de la côte Atlantique, du Labrador à la frontière entre le Maine et le Nouveau-Brunswick.

La collaboration continue avec un large éventail de parties prenantes fait partie intégrante de CIOOS-Atlantique, et nous travaillerons pour répondre aux besoins de la communauté océanographique et veiller à ce que les intérêts régionaux soient représentés au niveau national. L'accent est mis sur la création d'un système qui facilite l'accès aux données afin de soutenir le travail des partenaires, chercheurs, industries, etc.
description_translated.en:
CIOOS-Atlantic is a consortium of partner institutions which are committed to the development of a data management and dissemination approach for oceanographic data from the Atlantic Seaboard, a region spanning from Labrador to the Maine / New Brunswick border.

Meaningful engagement and ongoing communication with a broad variety of stakeholders is an integral component of CIOOS-Atlantic, and we will work to meet the needs of the local oceanographic community and ensure regional interests are represented at the national level. Emphasis is placed on the creation of a system which promotes easy data access and supports the work of partners, researchers, industry, and more.

title: Halifax Ocean Terminals: Fairview
